snippet.title: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Steam Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Join Marona and her Phantom friends on a mission to defeat the sinister Shipwreck Fleet when Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero launches on Steam on April 24, 2024!

Utilize Marona's abilities to sink the Shipwreck Fleet once and for all with the addition of new PC features such as 4K max resolution and ultrawide support! 

Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero is available now for Nintendo Switch, PS4, and PS5.

More info @ https://nisamerica.com/phantombrave-the-lost-hero

#PhantomBrave
